li: Analysis, design, coding, performance tuning, migration of data and implementation of database solutions using PostgreSQL
li.1: Evaluation, maintenance, and enhancement of existing processes, stored procedures, and functions, load and performance tuning of existing procedures
li.2: Data analysis, produce ad hoc queries and develop reports to support business needs
li.3: Create documentation for applications and processes
li.4: Daily triage of bugs and tasks

li: 4-5+ years working as a database developer working with MySQL/SQL Server/PostgreSQL
li.1: 1+ years working experience of PostgreSQL is a must
li.2: Expertise in stored procedures, functions, triggers, and views.
li.3: Ability to create normalized/de-normalized database schemas
li.4: Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
li.5: Knowledge of Devops and creating / promoting code through CI/CD pipeline
li.6: Experience in AWS development like Lambda functions, Python and glue job

li: Experienced in the full System Development Life Cycle (Dev, Test, Prod)
li.1: Should be experienced in executing migration projects.
li.2: Experienced in Cloud based Database - Dynamo DB
li.3: Writing and executing Unix shell scriptspostgressql
